description: Updates a information associated with a user id.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the application the user is attached to.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The email id attached to the user.

parameters.name: userAliasesToUpdate
parameters.description: The user aliases attached to the user id that are to be updated. (dict) --- Aliases attached to a user id within an Amazon Q Business application. indexId (string) --- The identifier of the index that the user aliases are associated with. dataSourceId (string) --- The identifier of the data source that the user aliases are associated with. The identifier of the user id associated with the user aliases.

nested_params.name: indexId
nested_params.description: The identifier of the index that the user aliases are associated with.

nested_params.name: dataSourceId
nested_params.description: The identifier of the data source that the user aliases are associated with.

nested_params.name: userId
nested_params.description: The identifier of the user id associated with the user aliases.

parameters.name: userAliasesToDelete
parameters.description: The user aliases attached to the user id that are to be deleted. (dict) --- Aliases attached to a user id within an Amazon Q Business application. indexId (string) --- The identifier of the index that the user aliases are associated with. dataSourceId (string) --- The identifier of the data source that the user aliases are associated with. The identifier of the user id associated with the user aliases.

nested_params.name: indexId
nested_params.description: The identifier of the index that the user aliases are associated with.

nested_params.name: dataSourceId
nested_params.description: The identifier of the data source that the user aliases are associated with.

nested_params.name: userId
nested_params.description: The identifier of the user id associated with the user aliases.
